MolSSI offers 1-2 day workshops as well as online tutorial materials. All
tutorials are hosted on GitHub in the MolSSI Education GitHub organization.
Workshops and materials here may still be under development. Outside
contribution is welcomed and encouraged!

![](molssi_main_horizontal.png){width="50%" link="http://education.molssi.org/resources.html"}

Tutorials and materials related to workshops:

-   Python Data and Scripting
-   Data Analysis using Python
-   Parallel Programming
